description: React component for an NDA Agreement page with form inputs, signature upload, PDF export, and local storage persistence.

methods.name: loadLocal
methods.description: Loads NDA form data from localStorage.

methods.name: saveLocal
methods.description: Saves NDA form data to localStorage.

methods.name: ensurePdfLibs
methods.description: Dynamically imports html2canvas and jsPDF libraries for PDF generation.

methods.name: handleExportPdf
methods.description: Generates and exports the NDA as a PDF, with fallback to print.

methods.name: SignatureLineOrThumb
methods.description: Displays signature thumbnail or placeholder line.
